org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.targets

Class LibrarySWFTarget

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.targets.Target
      • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.targets.SWFTarget
        • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.targets.LibrarySWFTarget
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILibrarySWFTarget, ISWFTarget, ITarget
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FlexLibrarySWFTarget

    public class LibrarySWFTarget
extends SWFTarget
implements ILibrarySWFTarget
    Class to build a library.swf for a SWC.

      • getCompilationUnits

        public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<ICompilationUnit> getCompilationUnits()
        Description copied from interface: ILibrarySWFTarget
        Get the compilation units included in this SWF. This includes the rootedCompilationUnits plus their dependencies. The compilation units will be ready after a successful call to the build() method.
        Specified by:
        getCompilationUnits in interface ILibrarySWFTarget
        Returns:
        the set of compilation units included in this SWF.
